ygData.subject: Problem with Bellow?
ygData.msgSnippet: All our other songs like Bellow will cycle and the other icons pop up a couple seconds after the song does it s thing. This one doesn t seem to. This song is
ygData.messageBody:
All our other songs like Bellow will cycle and the other icons pop up a
couple seconds after the song does it's thing. This one doesn't seem to.
This song is supposed to stay gray until the interval for recast is done,
but the other icons should ungray when the song cycle is finished.
Essentially, the icons should work like a clerics DA/DB. I've waited well
past the normal time that the other icons should come back up and they all
stay gray. It took me awhile to notice because I usually do twist and just
throw that one in when something is running, and my normal macro has
finished it's cycle of songs.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe, 55 forever!
Excalibur, Xegony
